system.description: When you charge through something standing in between you and where you're going, roll +Iron.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Your reckless charge causes problems. You have to go alone, or leave yourself open to danger, or damage something important, your choice.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
You charge through and leave a path for your allies to follow.

Your reckless charge causes problems. You have to go alone, or leave yourself open to danger, or damage something important, your choice.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You charge through and leave a path for your allies to follow.
